text: Kilekoile amikhan jani ase jodi amikhan prithibi te thaka tombu laga ghor5.1 Prithibi laga tombu ghor laga motlob ase amikhan laga gaw, juntu ekta tombu nisena ase. Jitia manu moribo, titia itu tombu ghor to bhangi jai. Etu hisab te, Paul to mora laga kotha kuwa ase. to bhangi jaise koile bhi, amikhan logote Isor laga ghor ase, juntu hath pora bona nohoi, hoilebi sorgo khan te thaka anonto ghor ase5.1 Heb. 9:11, Job 4:19. .
